channel.title: gan on Lemon Zest

item.title: 2019 10 29 Singan
item.description: ️️️⭐️️️️️️️️⭐️️️️️⭐️⭐️ | SinGAN, Learning a Generative Model from a Single Natural Image arXiv, GitHub SinGAN, short for Single GAN, is a GAN trained on a single image. It’s then used to generate sample from the same image. SinGAN sampling. The same model can then be used to perform a lot of transformations including: image inpainting image editing image harmonization super-resolution video animation from one frame SinGAN manipulations.
